item.title: [ 40] /vp/ plays Pokemon Wack
item.description:
LAST TIME:
>I continue playing Wack, pwn some criminals trying to steal a legendary that got randomized into some random shitmon, pwn an entire Juvite base, and go investigate what's going on in the Cherno City Power Plant
>Turns out Team Wack is trying to steal the nuclear waste legendary inside (which got randomized into a trubbish kek)
>After one of their admins accidentally pisses it off, I have to hide from the blast inside a conveniently nearby fridge
>I then fight the seventh gym leader, Hiroshima, who has two cocoonmons because lol randomizer
>Then I get struck with some annoying disease called Procrastination, I hope someone finds a cure
>Meanwhile YancyChan sits through a virtualization reskin, made by the same vantablack brimstone ID demon pretending to be a "developer" that also made Virtualization
>With mapping that genuinely makes Wack maps look better, from an aesthetic and definitely gameplay standpoint (there is no fucking legitimate purpose to have map sizes in excess of 250x250)
>Also some madman attempts to play some r*juvlike, but I've only seen one post from him since he said he'd play it so I'm giving it until next thread to see if he's actually gone insane or not
>4 days later I finally remember to play Wack like I should be doing, and make my way into Juvite-occupied Cyberspace to stop them from catching some legendaries

>What is this?
This is a thread where a bunch of autists come together and play usually shitty fangames and occasionally an actually decent one. Join this black hole of a general if you want.

>How do I join?
Just make a name and/or tripcode and start posting images of whatever fangame/romhack you're playing and try not to be annoying.

>"nu"-Archive (repurposed old rentry award)
https://rentry.org/vp-plays

Original filename: 2025-05-07 (29).png
item.author: Musk

item.title: [155] /co/ General Drawthread
item.description:
>Provide References for all requested characters and keep them to one image/post
>Keep requests /co/ related and keep them concise.
>General OC discussion belongs in "Work on your art" and the Donut Steel threads.
>However, OC requests are allowed as long as they aren't /trash/ material or fanfiction. If it's not /coc/ you must provide a link to the comic or cartoon.
>Be patient and take it easy! Don't forget to check the booru to see if your request was filled.
>Drawfriends, don't hold back.
>If a post breaks the rules, DO report and hide it. DON'T respond to it.
>Keep art critique short, otherwise take it to the Batman thread.
>No one is entitled to a request delivery.
>Don't bump or "second", "third", etc. requests. They eat up the post limit.
>No spam.
>Don't fight spam with spam.
>No begging.
>No AI deliveries, no AI discussion. Take them where they're wanted.
>To make the new Drawthread, wait for page 10 at bump limit.
>Have fun!

>Collection of Deliveries:
https://co.llection.pics/

>Drawfriends Gallery List:
rentry.org/txf8t

NSFW deliveries and requests should be posted in:
>>>/aco/drawthread
or
>>>/i/795305

Previous thread: >>148464163

item.title: [ 65] /lmg/ - Local Models General

/lmg/ - a general dedicated to the discussion and development of local language models.

►News
>(05/06) Absolute Zero reasoning training code released: https://github.com/LeapLabTHU/Absolute-Zero-Reasoner
>(05/06) ACE-Step released, 3.5B hybrid music generation model: https://hf.co/ACE-Step/ACE-Step-v1-3.5B
>(05/04) FormalMATH benchmark dataset for formal mathematical reasoning released: https://hf.co/datasets/SphereLab/FormalMATH-All

item.title: [330] /mlb/
item.description:
PREVIOUS: >>148393930

ATL: Chris Sale completed 6 2/3 shutout innings with 10 strikeouts in a no-decision against the Reds on Tuesday
BAL: Charlie Morton will start on Wednesday against the Twins
PHI: Nick Castellanos finished 3-for-5 with a homer, a double and four RBI in leading the Phillies to an 8-4 win over the Rays on Tuesday
WSH: Michael Soroka (biceps) will be activated to start on Wednesday against the Guardians
KC: Bobby Witt Jr. went 1-for-5 and delivered a walk-off RBI single in the ninth inning on Tuesday, propelling the Royals to a 4-3 victory over the White Sox
TB: Yandy Díaz was removed from Tuesday’s game against the Phillies with right hip tightness
NYY: Austin Wells had a grand slam and an RBI single as the Yankees smoked the Padres 12-3 on Tuesday
MIA: Agustín Ramírez went 2-for-4 with an RBI on Tuesday, propelling the Marlins to a 5-4 extra-inning win over the Dodgers

item.author: Son of Bakespie

item.title: [ 30] AI Pokemon Thread /NAPT/ Thread 183: Hot for Teacher Edition
item.description:
This is a general thread for people to post their AI art, and make requests from others who may want to attempt making their own Pokemon related gens.

NovelAI is a paid AI generator. Opus tier users have "unlimited" Small/Normal generations, though editing tools require credits.

Microsoft's Bing AI is a free image generator that is powered by DALL·E 3.

Civitai is free using its ‘buzz’ currency. You get about 50 every day plus more for liking models and gens.
>civitai.com

Otaiku is a (mostly) free mobile app. An ad watch is required between each image generation unless you pay.
>ailla.biz/otaiku

Tensor is free to use as well, although you are limited to how many gens you can make per day.
>https://tensor.art/

Local Generation using Stable Diffusion requires a decent video card. Guides for local genning can be found in the /g/ threads:
>>>/g/sdg
>>>/g/ldg
Other Stable Diffusion threads are on: /h/, /e/, /d/, /b/, /vt/, /aco/, /trash/

Hailuo AI takes uploaded art and animates them based on the prompts you get. You get a 3-day free trial, followed by roughly 3 free gens a day afterward. Subscription plans are available.
>https://hailuoai.video/

Pastebin of Pokemon artists:
>https://pastebin.com/U0mmK3Tm (embed)

Characters with under 300 images will require more tags to have them look correct. This is a list of all Pokemon characters with over 300 images:
>https://danbooru.donmai.us/posts?tags=*_%28pokemon%29+&z=5

If you plan on sharing multiple images together, we'd recommend posting just one, and give links for the rest. This way we can conserve space.

This is a locally run html tool provided by ThatOneAiAnon. It keeps track of all artists you like and turns Danbooru's entire tag system in a collapsible list of buttons. You can edit all the js, css, html code to modify the tool. (Ask him for updated versions or more Nai4 tools)
>mega .nz/file/67xwTRSB#m0fPUmJRaWd3oh47gt6nw2LKNMe820TaiKdXTAhx8tI

Previous Thread:>>57751991

Original filename: 1746379542441315.png

item.description:
>Hansi Flick: "I don't want to speak a lot about the referee but I think every 50/50 decision was for them. We gave everything and at the end it's like that. This is what makes me a little bit sad. I think about it, about the refereeing decisions, but I don’t want to talk about it. It’s not fair to my team, who did an amazing job. I don’t like talking about the referee. I’ve told him what I think, but I’m not going to say it here.”

item.title: [ 56] Official Win-O'-Thread
item.description:
>What is this thread?
Every Wins'day at Win-O'-Clock we gather here and post links to the latest scans and rips of comic books.
Most links we uploaded ourselves, others we are sharing from elsewhere.
Some comics we've even purchased ourselves (but most we didn't).
If you'd like to help out, just ask and we would be delighted to tell you how.
Otherwise, be patient, be polite, and understand the simple concept behind these words: Not posted means not available yet.

>Where can I find old Win-O'-Threads?
http://desuarchive.org/co/search/subject/Official%20Win-O'-Thread/
http://boards.fireden.net/co/search/subject/Official%20Win-O'-Thread/
(Note: This finds the OP for old threads. If you want to search for comics in the archive, clear the subject field!)

>Where can I find downloads for other comics?
Warez forums/blogs, DDL-indexing search engines (like FilesLoop), torrent trackers (like 1337x) and other P2P networks (like DC++).
If a link has been posted on 4chan, you can search for it in the Desu archive (add "http*" to searches to return only posts with links).
If all else fails, just >buy it.

>Where can I buy comics?
http://www.amazon.com/
On the various publishers' webstores, and at your local comics shop.

>Where can I find an LCS?
http://www.comicshoplocator.com/

>Where can I find out when new comics are released?
http://www.comiclist.com/index.php
http://www.previewsworld.com

>How do I download from websites that only give me .exe files?
Untick the checkbox under the download button.

>How can I find this thread every week?
If you are using the inline extension go to http://4chan.org/co/official or use the option under "Filters & Post Hiding".
If you have 4chanX go to Settings > Filter > Subject and add the following line:
/Official Win-O'-Thread/;highlight

>And last but not least
I worked on my backlog today then remembered why it had stayed in my backlog for so long

Original filename: hydra.png
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [106] What does /co/ think about Kelly Sue DeConnick's work? (Matt Fractions wife)
item.description:
What does /co/ think about Kelly Sue DeConnick's work? (Matt Fractions wife)

>Kelly Sue DeConnick was first introduced to the comics industry by writing copy for photos in adult magazines. She eventually moved on to posting her own stories on a message board for fellow comic book author Warren Ellis. He invited her to work on his new website at the time, artbomb.net, where she wrote catalog entries for comic-book issues.[3] Later in life, she got a job adapting translations of Japanese manga comics for Tokyopop and Viz Media.[4]

>To ensure the dialogue she was adapting to English still followed the story arcs, she worked with a translator. DeConnick did this for seven years, and estimates she wrote more than 11,000 comic-book pages. About her work in foreign adaptation she said "... when people say dialogue is the best part of my scripts, it’s because I had a lot of practice."

Imagine if shitposting on /co/ gave you a job with free money for the rest of your life, wouldn't that be great?

Original filename: Kelly_Sue_DeConnick_at_BookCon_(26700).jpg
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [138] Trump lies with another big fat lie
item.description:
Trump continues his regressive propaganda campaign with more lies about foreign government deals, using excuses paid for by billionaires
https://www.motherjones.com/politics/2025/05/trump-org-foreign-real-estate-deals-unconstitutional-business-ethics-conflict-interest/
Trump Promised No New Business Deals With Foreign Governments. He Lied.
His family’s real estate deals put the president in direct conflict with the Constitution.

released an “ethics agreement” detailing how he would handle his personal business interests while in the White House. It is remarkably weak and does not require Trump to divest any of his holdings. Unlike a similar agreement for his first term, it does not prohibit the Trump Organization from striking new deals abroad while Trump is president. Instead, it simply prohibits the Trump Organization from striking deals directly with foreign governments.

Trump’s second-term ethics agreement is such a permissive document that it is challenging to find a way to violate it. But three months into his presidency, Trump has found a way.

Last Thursday, the Trump Organization struck a deal to build a $5.5 billion Trump International Golf Club in Qatar. To develop the project, the Trump Organization is partnering with Dar Global, a Saudi Arabian company, and Qatari Diar, a company owned by the Qatari government. Qatari Diar was established by Qatar’s sovereign wealth fund in 2005. Its stated purpose is to “coordinate the country’s real estate development priorities.”

Original filename: Trump-Excuses-58b8dc005f9b58af5c8f8e91.jpg
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [ 33] Trump:America can't compete against Chinesekinos
item.description:
The Chinaman is too powerful...

https://www.bbc.com/news/articles/cjr7e2z1rxyo

Trump says non-US movies to be hit with 100% tariffs
54 minutes ago
Peter Hoskins
Business reporter
Maia Davies
BBC News

US President Donald Trump says he will hit movies made in foreign countries with 100% tariffs, as he ramps up trade disputes with nations around the world.

Trump said he was authorizing the US Department of Commerce and Trade Representative to start the process of imposing the levy because America's movie industry was dying "a very fast death."

He blamed a "concerted effort" by other countries that offer incentives to attract filmmakers and studios, which he described as a "National Security threat".

His remarks could spell a "knock-out blow" to the industry, one union warned, where filmmakers have for years left Hollywood for destinations like the UK and Canada in search of lower costs.

Trump said on his Truth Social platform: "It is, in addition to everything else, messaging and propaganda!"

"WE WANT MOVIES MADE IN AMERICA, AGAIN!"

US Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick responded to the announcement, saying, "We're on it."

But the details of the move are unclear. Trump's statement did not say whether the tariff would apply to American production companies producing films abroad.

Several recent major movies produced by US studios were shot outside of America, including Deadpool & Wolverine, Wicked, and Gladiator II.

It was also unclear if the tariffs would apply to films on streaming services, like Netflix, as well as those shown at cinemas, or how they would be calculated.

The founder of European cinema chain Vue, Timothy Richards, questioned how Trump would define a US film.

Speaking to BBC Radio 4's Today program, he said: "Is it where the money comes from? The script, the director, the talent, where it was shot?"

Original filename: GqJEHteWkAAG6SR.jpg
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [ 42] Propaganda agency for Chief Retard acts retarded.
item.description:
https://www.msn.com/en-us/news/politics/the-white-house-posts-ai-generated-image-of-trump-as-a-buff-jedi-happy-may-the-4th-to-you-all/ar-AA1E9tx8?ocid=BingNewsSerp

The official White House X and Instagram accounts on Sunday posted an AI-generated image of Donald Trump as a beefed-up Jedi in celebration of "Star Wars" day.

The post read, "Happy May the 4th to all, including the Radical Left Lunatics who are fighting so hard to bring Sith Lords, Murderers, Drug Lords, Dangerous Prisoners, & well known MS-13 Gang Members, back into our Galaxy. You're not the Rebellion-you're the Empire. May the 4th be with you."

item.title: [122] Small business general
item.description:
Sup anons

I have worked in small businesses for most of my working life and have always ended up in some position of management. the owner of the first shop I worked in wanted to partner with me because he thought I had potential but I had to move for university. besides that I've managed/worked in event venues/bars, artisanal food production & brewing and some white collar work

I'm set to inherit a sizeable fortune in the future and want out of the wagecuck cage, preferably having a small business on as my side gig before I am in a position to invest heavily in it. I also likely have the ability to get personal loans/startup capital from family.

Do you have a small business? What industry/market do you cater to? What's your overhead & net profit like? What are some common pitfalls or mistakes people make when starting a business?

Original filename: 3101D90B00000578-3437959-image-m-128_1454971498722.jpg

item.description:
Hey voyagers,

The sticky probably needs to be updated, I'll keep the thread open for suggestions:

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

/trv/ is a slow board, so don't expect immediate responses. CHECK THE CATALOG – you might find threads already discussing topics you're interested in.

Before asking for suggestions, tell /trv/ about your:
>Budget
>Interests
>Level of understanding of the local language(s)
This makes it easier to give quality advice. Of course, keep your posts travel related.

For all other matters:
General culture questions >>>/int/
Politics discussion >>>/pol/
Transportation discussion >>>/n/
Outdoors-related discussion >>>/out/

For more information about safety, planning and other miscellaneous topics, check out the pastebin:

GENERAL INFO:
https://pastebin.com/yR1SAr3s

Note: Discussions of prostitution or sex tourism are not permitted on /trv/.

item.title: [210] /out/ings with a pipe
item.description:
Old thread: >>2774508

This is a thread for enjoying a pipe while doing outdoor activities. If you ask why this belongs on /out/, you've never spent an evening by the campfire with a pipe silently enjoying the nature around you, and you're missing out.

>how to get started
Purchase a Missouri Meerschaum Legend and a pouch of Half and Half or Captain Black tobacco, available at most smoke shops. You will need a lighter or match, and something to tamp it with--a large nail works well if you don't have a pipe tool. Fill the pipe with tobacco, pack it down halfway, top it off, pack it down to 3/4, top it off again, pack gently and enjoy. Smoke slower than you think you need to, the tobacco tastes best when it is burning cool. Tamp and re-light as needed. If you still have trouble, try different methods on YouTube until you find one that works for you.

>smoking a pipe will give you cancer
While any tobacco consumption comes with some risk, the cancer risks from occasional pipe use are pretty minimal. Educate yourself and make your own informed health decisions. Some info here https://aacrjournals.org/cancerpreventionresearch/article/10/12/704/46541/Association-between-Cigar-or-Pipe-Smoking-and

>muh weed
Not the time or place. Start your own thread

>I DON’T LIKE WHAT YOU LIKE REEEEEE
Then leave the thread. Pipes have been a part of outdoors culture for centuries. If you don’t like it, leave.

Original filename: 0687fd190525af3678814c5f459c2d0a.jpg
item.author: Anonymous
